T02D1330:285a-0: @285a * // gdung bsreg pa'i cho ga bzhugs//
T02D1330:285a-2: # // dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1330:285a-3: lag na rdo rje dril bu byin nas ni //
T02D1330:285a-4: dbu la legs pa'i dbu rgyan ni //
T02D1330:285a-5: byin nas rdo rje sdom pa yang //
T02D1330:285a-6: sdom pa byin pa'i man ngag nyid //
T02D1330:285a-7: mig la sogs par gti mug sogs //
T02D1330:285a-8: gtor gsum go 'phang gsum la gzhag / rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis //
T02D1330:285a-9: gdung bsreg pa yang yang dag bya //
T02D1330:285a-10: nyi ma gsum pa'i nyin par ni //
T02D1330:285a-11: rus pa'i tshogs ni legs par bsdu //
T02D1330:285a-12: 'o ma dri zhim gyis khrus bya //
T02D1330:285a-13: des ni mchod rten bya ba'o //
T02D1330:285a-14: 'di'i don ni dang por dri zhim pos khrus bya ba dang /
T02D1330:285a-15: gos la sogs pa byas pa'i dbu rgyan sbyin pa dang /
T02D1330:285a-17: dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1330:285a-23: bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur nas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i gzugs su bskyed la /
T02D1330:285a-24: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa sngon
T02D1330:285a-25: du 'gro bas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab
T02D1330:285a-26: pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1330:285a-27: sngags kyi tshogs mang po bzlas pa bya ba dang /
T02D1330:285a-30: bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas /
T02D1330:285a-31: sngags kyi bzlas pa mang po bya ba dang /
T02D1330:285b-0: ji lta @285b pa bzhin du me thab me lha
T02D1330:285b-1: bskyed pa de'i thugs kar rdo rje sems dpa' 'am
T02D1330:285b-2: / rang gi lhag pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D1330:285b-3: dkyil 'khor bskyed de shi ba'i lus kyi ye shes
T02D1330:285b-5: de'i dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D1330:285b-6: 'khor dang bcas pa ro gcig tu gyur par lhag
T02D1330:285b-7: par mos shing gdung bsreg par bya zhes bya ba'i
T02D1330:285b-8: don to // gang de ltar mi byed na de'i tshe mchod rten bshig pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1330:285b-9: gdung bsreg pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D1330:285b-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po aa shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D1330:285b-12: lo ts'a ba dge slong dpal gyi snying pos bsgyur ba'o /
